2.title: Shearing Sheep and Playing with Puppies in the Scottish Highlands
2.plot: The Scottish Highlands aren't just home to the Loch Ness monster-as Alyssa finds out, it's home to rolling green hills, and a life of shepherding and fly fishing. After an afternoon of playing with pup sheep dogs, she takes in local live music at the world-famous Hootenanny. From sheep shearing to chowing down on some homemade haggis, the Highlands are full of adventure and charm.

3.title: Scotch Malt Whiskey Trail
3.plot: In the heart of Scotland, Alyssa explores the world of Scotch Malt Whiskey with the help of her driver Ken. On the Scotch Malt Whiskey Trail, Alyssa learns how to properly appreciate a glass of Scotch. In Macallan, she visits a world-famous distiller and enjoys a tasting session. At the Craigellechie, she gets exposure to the budding trend of whiskey and food pairings.

imdb.plot outline: Alyssa Caverley knows how to make the most out of a trip. From London, England, to Zurich, Switzerland and to New Brunswick, Canada, she takes us with her as she explores new sites and local gems. There's something for every sort of traveler: canyoning and zip lining, European farmer's markets, Canadian gastropubs, and even Swiss train rides to the top of the Alps.
imdb.title: Modern Traveler
plot: Alyssa Caverley knows how to make the most out of a trip. From London, England, to Zurich, Switzerland and to New Brunswick, Canada, she takes us with her as she explores new sites and local gems. There's something for every sort of traveler: canyoning and zip lining, European farmer's markets, Canadian gastropubs, and even Swiss train rides to the top of the Alps.
